title: vElavanE umai thEDi
sahitya:
vElavarE umai tEDi oru maDandai viDiyumaLavum kAttirukkira



vaghai enna 



(vElavarE)







anupallavi







vAlibamum shel vizhiyum vilpuruvam vaDivil nUliDaiyum



madivadanamum



mElumavaL mEni pagam ponniramE minnarkkoDi pOl anna naDaiyAl



oyilAgavE 



(vElavarE)







caraNam







vidam vidamAga pacciLamtengu mIdinilE vENa paNi tarittu



palvarishaiyum



kadalittALum adarakkani shorukkazhagum karuttai urukka



kalakalena naDaiyil vandu 



(vElavarE)
